attributes.action: provide free public transport for cancer sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has become apparent to me that the government has more consideration for the unemployed and workshy members of our community than for the seriously ill.Although many cancer sufferers are still able to make their own way to hospital(often very far from home)I see no reason why they should bear the brunt of the costs for this travel.
As decent members of the tax paying public we would rather see our hard earned helping those that deserve it most.
Thank you very much for your support
